text.div:
CancerDiseaseStatusEvidenceTypeVS ValueSet

The type of evidence backing up the clinical determination of cancer progression. The code 'SCT#252416005 Histopathology test (procedure)' is intended to be used when there is a biopsy that contributes evidence of the cancer disease status.

name: CancerDiseaseStatusEvidenceTypeVS
title: Cancer Disease Status Evidence Type VS
description: The type of evidence backing up the clinical determination of cancer progression. The code 'SCT#252416005 Histopathology test (procedure)' is intended to be used when there is a biopsy that contributes evidence of the cancer disease status.
